content: lowkey bandana lowkey bold knit sizing one size customizable to any size sample scarf long edge 77 cm 30 3 in short edge 53 cm 20 9 in gauge 20 stitches x 42 row in lacy grid stitch pattern on a 3 5 mm us 4 needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches to make a gauge swatch cast on an odd number of sts and follow this 4 row repeat row 1 ws knit all sts row 2 rs k1 repeat k2tog till end of row turn row 3 ws k1 *untwisted m1 k1* repeat from * to * till end of row turn row 4 rs *k2tog yo* repeat from * to * until one st left on the needle k1 turn needles any straight or circular 3 5 mm us 4 needles materials recommended 50 g safran by drops design 50 g = 160 m 175 yds sample is knitted in safran by drops design in color 61 green tea level of difficulty easy or 2/5 or beginner required skills following written lace pattern icelandic bind off lowkey bold knit abbreviations rs ws - right side wrong side st sts stitch stitches k p knit purl sl - slip_stitch from left to right needle purlwise with working yarn in the back k2tog - knit 2 stitches together yo - yarn over - bring working yarn to the front between the needles wrap yarn over the right needle and bring it to the back of the work work the next stitch as usual untwisted m1 - insert the left needle from front to back under the bar between the stitches thus lifting it onto the left needle - it looks like yo knit this bar through the front loop kfb - knit front & back - insert the right needle into the stitch to knit complete the knit stitch but do not drop the stitch off the left needle bring the right needle to the back and insert it into the back of the old stitch yarn over and draw loop through slide the original stitch off the left needle turn - turn your work from right side to wrong side or vice versa video references in this link you will find useful videos that are complementary to the knitting instructions https //www youtube com/watch v=buvejpgfvhc&list=pljiwb6be2y6uurbdvbspsyi03ucmu7mwd 2 lowkey bold knit pattern scarf is knitted in lacy grid stitch pattern is worked from the center and increased on both sides to form a triangular shape set up row 1 ws using backwards loop method cast on 3 sts 3 row 2 rs k2 drop last st turn 2 row 3 ws kfb kfb turn 4 row 4 rs sl1 k3 4 row 5 ws sl1 kfb kfb k1 turn 6 row 6 rs sl1 k5 turn 6 row 7 ws sl1 k2 untwisted m1 k3 turn 7 row 8 rs sl1 k1 k2tog k3 turn 6 row 9 ws sl1 k2 untwisted m1 k1 untwisted m1
